nodes.text: Transcept Media Solutions was a surveillance company based on Gorse that worked for the Galactic Republic and later the Galactic Empire. One of the company's divisions was Myder's Mynocks, which was headed by and named after the Sullustan Zaluna Myder. Another member of the Mynocks was Hetto, who was secretly in contact with the rebel operative Hera Syndulla. The company operated from the World Window Plaza building.
Transcept was drafted into Imperial service to assist Darth Sidious conduct the Great Jedi Purge.
